newsitem.title: GEORGIA: SOCCER-GEORGIA SQUAD FOR WORLD CUP MATCH V ENGLAND.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-GEORGIA SQUAD FOR WORLD CUP MATCH V ENGLAND.

text.p: The Georgia squad for their World Cup European group two qualifier against England at Wembley on April 30 was announced on Friday as follows:
Goalkeepers: Irakly Zoidze (Dynamo Tbilisi), Nika Togonidze (Dynamo Batumi).

Defenders: Mamuka Machavariani (Dynamo Tbilisi), Gela Shekiladze (Dynamo Batumi), Kakhi Tskhadadze (Alania Vladikavkaz), Murtaz Shelia (Alania Vladikavkaz), Nugzar Lobzhanidze (CSKA Moscow), Georgy Chikhradze (Shakhtyor Donetsk).

Midfielders: Kakhi Gogichaishvili (Dynamo Tbilisi), Georgy Nemsadze (Trabzonspor Turkey), Gocha Dzhamarauli (Trabzonspor Turkey), Goga Gakhokidze (Alania Vladikavkaz), Temur Ketsbaya (AEK Athens, Greece), Georgy Kinkladze (Manchester City England).
Forwads: Archil Arveladze (Trabzonspor, Turkey), Shota Arveladze (Trabzonspor, Turkey), Mikhail Kavelashvili (Manchester City, England), Gocha Gogrichidze (Zhemchuzhina Sochi).
